comments:
Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Window -> Preferences -> Server -> Installed Runtimes -> Add...
2. Select JBoss -> JBoss v5.0, check "Also create new local server", Next
3. Select jre (mine is jdk1.5.0_12) and browse to install location (mine is C:/programs/jboss/as), next
4. In Server Configuration, choose "other - type your own here" and type the name of a valid JBoss configuration (mine is an exact copy of the default configuration called "qsi")
5. Click Finish - Nothing will happen


More information:
I have not tried to reproduce this with any other versions of JBoss.

From the logs, here is the exception that I am getting:
